presentation.name: Otávio Mendes Santos
presentation.description: Passionate about technology, I am a junior web developer in constant learning. I am a communicative and collaborative professional who values teamwork and knowledge sharing.

skills.title: Skills
skills.intermediateKnowledge: Intermediate knowledge, able to use in small projects
skills.evaluationCriteriaDescription:
I reflect on my past projects and evaluate my performance based on practical results:
1-3: Basic or beginner knowledge.
4-6: Intermediate knowledge, able to apply in small projects.
7-8: Advanced knowledge, with solid experience.
9-10: Expertise or mastery level.
skills.externalFeedbackDescription: I ask for feedback from colleagues, mentors, or leaders (managers, coworkers, teachers) to evaluate my current skills. This offers an external perspective and balances my self-assessment.
skills.goalsDescription:
Short term (1-3 months): Skills I want to improve soon.
Medium term (6 months - 1 year): Skills that require more practice or learning.
Long term (1-2 years): More complex or advanced level skills.
skills.smartMethodDescription:
Specific: I determine exactly which aspect of the skill I want to improve.
Measurable: How can success be measured? For example, completing a project or obtaining a certification.
Attainable: Is the skill realistic considering my current level and context?
Relevant: How does this skill contribute to my career or personal goals?
Time-bound: How long do I expect to reach this level?
skills.marketBenchmarkingDescription: I research market expectations for the skills I want to develop, adjusting my assessments according to the requirements of my area of expertise.

systemRefactoring.title: System Refactoring
systemRefactoring.description: Participated in refactoring the company's main system alongside the front-end team, making it more performant, modern, and intuitive, with new features and better user experience.

challengeResolution.title: Challenge Resolution
challengeResolution.description: Solved technical challenges with creative and efficient approaches, contributing innovative solutions adopted as best practices by the team.

componentDevelopment.title: Component Development
componentDevelopment.description: Developed and maintained components such as dynamic forms, interactive maps, support for multiple brands (whitelabel), and global notification system (snackbar), focusing on modularity and usability.

typescript.title: TypeScript Typing
typescript.description: Created and maintained global types, interfaces, and DTOs in TypeScript, promoting consistency between application layers and reducing integration errors.

bugFixing.title: Bug Resolution
bugFixing.description: Worked on identifying and resolving bugs, collaborating with the back-end team to ensure system stability and improve communication between layers.

libraryImplementation.title: Library Implementation
libraryImplementation.description: Researched, tested, and implemented libraries that best fit the project's needs, focusing on performance, usability, and maintainability.

stateManagement.title: State Management
stateManagement.description: Implemented and maintained global state management, ensuring predictability, data consistency, and facilitating system scalability.

react.title: React
react.description: Intensive course on React, covering from basic syntax to advanced concepts like Hooks and Context API. Includes a final project where we developed a complete application (Dogs).

javascript.title: JavaScript
javascript.description: Complete JavaScript training, covering from fundamentals to advanced techniques. The course includes the use of classes, objects, web APIs, design patterns, and DOM manipulation.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: Intensive course on TypeScript, covering from basic syntax to advanced concepts like Interfaces and Data Typing.

reactWithTypeScript.title: React with TypeScript
reactWithTypeScript.description: Intensive course on React with TypeScript, covering from basic syntax to advanced concepts like Hooks and Context API.

flexbox.title: FlexBox
flexbox.description: Course focused on CSS Flexbox, addressing properties such as flex, flexShrink, and flexGrow to create responsive and flexible layouts.

gameDevJs.title: JavaScript Game Development
gameDevJs.description: Introduction to game development using JavaScript, addressing basic concepts of game programming and creating interactivity. Includes projects made during the course (Virtual Piano, Ralph Wreck-It Game, Memory Game, etc).

kotlinBackend.title: Kotlin Back End Development
kotlinBackend.description: Introduction to backend development using Kotlin, covering language fundamentals and the creation of APIs and services.

clearKanban.name: Clear Kanban
clearKanban.description: A Kanban application designed to efficiently and collaboratively manage demands. It offers features such as user authentication, email password recovery, and real-time communication using WebSockets, ensuring instant updates and a smooth user experience.

dogs.name: Dogs - Social Network for Dogs
dogs.description: Social Network for Dogs. Complete with comments, posts, authentication, etc.

fantasticAnimals.name: Fantastic Animals
fantasticAnimals.description: Website with functionalities made in JavaScript

flexBlog.name: FlexBlog
flexBlog.description: Website created to explore flexbox display properties.

pomodoro.name: Pomodoro
pomodoro.description: Pomodoro website for studies, with task list, sound alerts and interactive menu.

pokedex.name: Pokédex
pokedex.description: Pokédex with listing of Pokémon via pokeAPI.

toDoList.name: To Do List
toDoList.description: Basic To Do List, with a task list and add and remove buttons.

detonaRalph.name: Wreck-It Ralph Game
detonaRalph.description: Whack-a-mole game in the Wreck-It Ralph theme (Need to add responsiveness).

memoryGame.name: Memory Game
memoryGame.description: Memory game with emojis (Need to add responsiveness).

joKenPoYuGiOh.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Yu-Gi-Oh Game
joKenPoYuGiOh.description: Rock-Paper-Scissors game with Yu-Gi-Oh theme (Need to add responsiveness).

breeze.name: Breeze
breeze.description: Mobile app for weather forecast - Studying React Native and Expo.

name.label: Name
name.error: Name must have at least 3 letters.
